conversations.english: How are you doing, Christopher?
conversations.chinese: 克里斯多夫,你最近过得怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: To be honest, I'm reallt fed up with work at the monent. I need a break!
conversations.reply_chinese: 老实说,我现在上班上得 有点不耐烦了.我需要放个假!

conversations.english: How do you arrange this summer vacation?
conversations.chinese: 你怎么安排这个暑假呢？
conversations.reply_english: I want to travel.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想去旅行。

conversations.english: Wake up, Mary.
conversations.chinese: 玛丽，醒醒。
conversations.reply_english: What is it? It's eight in the morning.
conversations.reply_chinese: 有什事吗？现在才早上八点。

conversations.english: Hi, Larry, how was your weekend?
conversations.chinese: 嘿,拉里,周末过得怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: Not bad. We had a get-together with friends from college. I haven't seen many of them since gradution. How about you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 挺不错的,我和大学同学聚会了,其中好多人毕业后我就没见过.你呢?

title: 周末怎么过What will you do this weekend

conversations.english: Another weekend is coming!
conversations.chinese: 又是一个周末.
conversations.reply_english: And we're going to have summer vacation.
conversations.reply_chinese: 而且快放署假了.

title: 周末去看病Going to see the doctor

conversations.english: I'm going to see the doctor this weekend.
conversations.chinese: 我周末去看病。
conversations.reply_english: What's your trouble?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你怎么了？

title: 周末去购物Doing shopping this weekend

conversations.english: How about doing shopping this weekend?
conversations.chinese: 这个周末去购物怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: What're you going to buy?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你要买什么？

conversations.english: Paul,let's go and see Grandpa this afternoon.
conversations.chinese: 保罗，我们今天下午去看爷爷吧。
conversations.reply_english: But Grandpa will be working.
conversations.reply_chinese: 可爷爷得上班呀。

conversations.english: What are you doing over the weekend, Sara?
conversations.chinese: Sara, 你周末要做什么？
conversations.reply_english: I'm planing to go balling tonight. Tomorrow I was hoping to see a movie. What about you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 今天晚上，我打算去打保龄球。明天我希望可以去看电影，你呢？

conversations.english: The weekend's finally here!
conversations.chinese: 周末总算到了！
conversations.reply_english: And it's a long one. I have Monday off. It's Memorial Day or something like that.
conversations.reply_chinese: 而且是个长长的周末。我星期一放假。好象是阵亡将士纪念日还是什幺的。

conversations.english: Now the coals are just right. I can start grilling.
conversations.chinese: 现在木炭差不多好了。我要开始烤了。
conversations.reply_english: Here you go. I made up the burger patties for you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你拿去吧。我已经帮你准备好汉堡肉饼了。

conversations.english: Where do you spend the weekend?
conversations.chinese: 你周末在哪儿过？
conversations.reply_english: We've a country house.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们乡下有一处房子。

conversations.english: Are you going to the beach this saturday afternoon?
conversations.chinese: 你本周六下午打算去海边吗？
conversations.reply_english: It depends on the weather.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那得看天气。

title: 周末庆祝国庆游行活动

conversations.english: There will be a parade to celebrate National Day this weekend.
conversations.chinese: 本周末有庆祝国庆游行活动.
conversations.reply_english: What's the route?
conversations.reply_chinese: 路线怎么走？

conversations.english: Hello, ladies. I'm firing up the grill. We can eat in an hour or so.
conversations.chinese: 哈啰，小姐们。我正在生火。我们过一小时左右就可以吃了。
conversations.reply_english: Chips, finger foods, desserts, baked beans. Where're the pork and beef strips?
conversations.reply_chinese: 洋芋片、小零嘴、点心、焗豆。猪肉和牛肉片呢？

conversations.english: Does anyone need a drink?
conversations.chinese: 有谁想喝饮料？
conversations.reply_english: I'll take one. How's the cooler situation?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要来一瓶。冰桶里目前情况如何？

conversations.english: That's good to know. We'll watch for crazy drivers.
conversations.chinese: 多亏你提醒。我们会当心疯狂驾驶的.
conversations.reply_english: Hey, guys. Ready for a pick-up game of touch football?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你们好啊。想要玩触身式美式足球游戏吗？

conversations.english: We’re going to the Dragon Boat Festival tomorrow. Feel like coming along?
conversations.chinese: 我们明天要参加端午节庆典，想要跟我们去吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. I’ve never seen a dragon boat race.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好啊，我从来没看过划龙舟比赛。

conversations.english: Happy Mother’s Day, Mom！
conversations.chinese: 妈，母亲节快乐。
conversations.reply_english: Thanks! These are beautiful. You shouldn’t have!
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢，这些花很漂亮，你不应该买的。

conversations.english: What are you and Corey doing for Valentine’s Day this Friday?
conversations.chinese: 你和科里这星期五会去做什么？
conversations.reply_english: Probably nothing.
conversations.reply_chinese: 可能什么也不做。

title: 周末要好好休息 Have a complete relaxation

conversations.english: I want to have a complete relaxation this weekend.
conversations.chinese: 这周末我要好好休息。
conversations.reply_english: You mean you want to stay at home?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你是说要呆在家里？

title: 周末过得如何 How was your weekend

conversations.english: Hi, Sandra. how was your weekend?
conversations.chinese: 嗨, Sandra. 你周末过得如何啊?
conversations.reply_english: Great! I went hiking in the mountains on Saturday.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好极了! 我星期六去爬山了.

conversations.english: We are doing Secret Santa at the office again this year.
conversations.chinese: 今年办公室里又玩了一次“秘密圣诞老人”，我们正在进行中。
conversations.reply_english: Whose name did you pick?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你选到谁？

conversations.english: I’m home!Everyone come here!I bought a Christmas tree!Look at this beautiful pine tree!
conversations.chinese: 我回来了。大家都过来吧。我买了一棵圣诞树。来看看这颗漂亮的松树。
conversations.reply_english: Wow, it’s huge! Are you sure it will fit in the living room?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哇，这棵树真大。你确定客厅里能放下吗？

conversations.english: The Day of the Dead has arrived All Soul’s Day and All Saint’s Day!
conversations.chinese: 死者悼念之日来了。万灵杰和万圣节。
conversations.reply_english: Your neighbor is crazy. Why is he screaming that?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你的邻居真疯狂。他在喊什么？

title: 万圣节不请吃就捣蛋Trick or treat

conversations.english: Tom, aren’t you a little too old to be trick-or-treating?
conversations.chinese: 汤姆，玩"不请吃就捣蛋"的游戏你是不是有些岁数大了？
conversations.reply_english: What are you talking about? Where is your Halloween spirit ? Didn’t you ever dress up in a costume and go around the neighborhood trick-or-treating with your friends?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你说什么？你的万圣节精神呢？你不曾穿万圣节的服装并和朋友们一起向邻居要糖吗？

title: 中国情人节七夕 The seventh Eve

conversations.english: Why don't we Chinese have our own Valentine's Day?
conversations.chinese: 我们中国为什么没有自己的情人节呢？
conversations.reply_english: Of course we have. It's on the seventh day of the seventh lunar month.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们当然有，是在农历七月初七。

conversations.english: Merry Christmas!
conversations.chinese: 圣诞快乐！
conversations.reply_english: The same to you!
conversations.reply_chinese: 你也一样！

conversations.english: Spring Festival is the most important festival in China,isn't it?
conversations.chinese: 春节是中国最重要的节日，是吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,that's true.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。

conversations.english: Have you got any plans for the coming holiday?
conversations.chinese: 你对即将到来的假期有什么计划吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I have a very special one. I will be doing volunteer work in a zoo for two weeks. A friend of mine working there told me the other day that they were in need of some volunteer keepers. I was very interested. So I asked him to get me the application form. Lucky, my application was approved by the manager very soon.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我有一个十分特别的计划。我会去动物园做两个星期的志愿者。我一个在那里工作的朋友前几天告诉我，他们需要一些志愿饲养员。我很有兴趣。所以我跟他要了一张申请表。很幸运，我的申请表很快被经理同意了。

conversations.english: I am not sure what to do during the holidays, any suggestions?
conversations.chinese: 我不知道假期的时候要做什么，你有什么建议吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, going to a cinema, visiting the galleries, exhibitions and museums, finding and meeting old friends, exercising in the health club or mountain biking. There are so many good choices.
conversations.reply_chinese: 额，看电影，参观美术馆，展览会和博物馆，与老朋友见面，去健康俱乐部锻炼或者进行高山自行车运动。有这么多的选择。

conversations.english: Is Water Shrinking Festival official?
conversations.chinese: 泼水节是法定节日吗？
conversations.reply_english: No,most of the traditional festivals of the minority nationalities are not official.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不是,大多数少数民族节日都不是法定的。

conversations.english: Do you know about All Fools' Day?
conversations.chinese: 你知道愚人节是怎么回事吗？
conversations.reply_english: On that day,people play all kinds of tricks on others,and the one easily taken in is called April fool.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那天人们互相捉弄，容易上当的叫四月傻瓜。

conversations.english: Could you tell me the origin of the Dragon-Boat Festival?
conversations.chinese: 把端午节的来历告诉我好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,it's a way to commemorate a great ancient romantic poet,and the race is a symbol of the attempt to save him.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的,这是人们纪念古代一位伟大的浪漫主义诗人的活动.龙舟比赛是奋力救诗人的象征。

conversations.english: How many days do you take off for Easter?
conversations.chinese: 你们复活节放几天假？
conversations.reply_english: Usually we have a month off.
conversations.reply_chinese: 通常放一个月。

title: 新年愿望 New Year's resolution

conversations.english: It's almost midnight! We are about to start a brand new year!
conversations.chinese: 现在已经是午夜了！我正准备迎接新年的到来！
conversations.reply_english: I know it's so exciting! A new year is always like a clean slate. Fresh start to accomplish any dreams, objectives and goals.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道这样很兴奋！新的一年就像一个干净的石板。可以重新书写你的梦想，目标和方向。

conversations.english: Dad, dad, dad! Wake up! It's Christmas!
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，爸爸，爸爸！快起来。今天是圣诞节！
conversations.reply_english: Timmy. It's too early for this. Look, it's six in the morning! Go back to bed!
conversations.reply_chinese: 米，现在太早了，现在才6点，回去睡觉吧。

conversations.english: I’m home! Everyone come here! I bought a Christmas tree! Look at this beautiful pine tree!
conversations.chinese: 我回来了。大家都过来吧。我买了一棵圣诞树。来看看这颗漂亮的松树。
conversations.reply_english: Wow, it’s huge! Are you sure it will fit in the living room?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哇，这棵树真大。你确定客厅里能放下吗？

title: 讲讲冰雪节Ice and Snow Festival

conversations.english: Tell me something about your Ice & Snow Festival.
conversations.chinese: 给我讲讲冰雪节吧。
conversations.reply_english: That's the most magic Festival,people build palaces and sculpture things with ice and snow.It's beautiful!
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是最神奇的节日了，人们用冰雪造宫殿,雕刻各种各样的东西,美极了

conversations.english: Hide me, Yi-jun! The kids all think I'm the real Easter bunny!
conversations.chinese: 帮我找个地方躲起来，怡君！小朋友全都以为我是真的复活节兔子啦!
conversations.reply_english: Aw, that's sweet! I knew your costume would be a success.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哎哟，那真可爱！我就知道你的道具服会大受欢迎的。

title: 你们感恩节都做些什么

conversations.english: So what are you doing for Thanksgiving?
conversations.chinese: 你们感恩节都做些什么？
conversations.reply_english: Not much really. It's more of an American tradition, so back home we don't really celebrate it. In fact, I am not even sure of what exactly is being celebrated!
conversations.reply_chinese: 没有很多的事，这个是美国的传统，回到家我们并不过这个节。我甚至不确定究竟要庆祝哪些东西。

title: 新年计划A new year’s resolution

conversations.english: Did you read this? It says that the number one new years resolution make is to spend more time with friends and family.
conversations.chinese: 你读这个了吗？那上面说新年最重要的计划就是要多花些时间和朋友和家人多相处。
conversations.reply_english: Why would that be funny?
conversations.reply_chinese: 那个有意思吗？

conversations.english: Do you have any plans for Veteran’s Day?
conversations.chinese: 你打算怎么过退伍军人节？
conversations.reply_english: You mean Armistice Day.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你是说休战日.

conversations.english: What do people usually do on Saint Valentine's Day?
conversations.chinese: 情人节人们干什么？
conversations.reply_english: On that day,boys are supposed to give roses to their sweethearts.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那天小伙子们给自己的情人送玫瑰花。

conversations.english: Can you name some festivals of religious nature?
conversations.chinese: 你能说出几个由宗教来的节日吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,such as Christmas and Easter.
conversations.reply_chinese: 能，圣诞节和复活节就是。

title: 复活节是团聚的好日子

conversations.english: Boy, it looks like everyone in your family is here, from young to old.
conversations.chinese: 天啊，看来你一家老小都在这里了。
conversations.reply_english: Easter's a good day for reunions. The family goes to church together.
conversations.reply_chinese: 复活节是团聚的好日子。全家都会一起上教堂。

title: 为母亲挑选圣诞节礼物

conversations.english: Bill. Bill! You gotta help me!
conversations.chinese: 比尔，比尔，你得帮帮我。
conversations.reply_english: What’s wrong? Slow down or you are gonna give yourself a heart attack.
conversations.reply_chinese: 怎么了？镇定点，否则你心脏会受不了。

conversations.english: Wow, there are so many lanterns to appreciate. Now, I can see why it's called the Lantern Festival. It deserves its name.
conversations.chinese: 哇，这里有好多灯笼可以观赏啊。现在，我知道它为什么被称为灯笼节了。真是名副其实啊。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah. People always enjoy the lighted lanterns and the gala performances.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊。人们都很喜欢这些点亮的灯笼和欢庆的表演。

conversations.english: Your tree looks beautiful. Do you decorate it this way every year?
conversations.chinese: 你们的树看起来好漂亮。你们每年都这么布置吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, it's a family tradition dating back to my childhood. We use the same lights and ornaments, but of course we have a new tree each year.The children made some of these decorations. Here, you can hang this on one of those high branches.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。记得从我孩提时候开始这就是家里的传统了。我们用一样的灯泡和装饰品；当然，我们每年都用一棵新树。这些装饰中有一部分是孩子们弄的。给，你可以把这个吊在一根高枝上。

conversations.english: Merry Christmas!
conversations.chinese: 圣诞快乐！
conversations.reply_english: Huh?
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯？
